description:
Luca is a member of Passione who extorts money from taxi drivers picking up tourists from Naples airport. He is commonly called "Leaky-eye Luca" because of injury due to which his right eye tears up.
When smashing a frog created by http://anidb.net/ch96495 [Giorno`s] http://anidb.net/ch98426 [Gold Experience] stand, Luca gets his attack reflected and falls into coma. After that the Passione boss gives an order to dispose of him.
name: Namidame no Luca
